description:
Chris is back -- and looking better than ever.

Chris has been working out, keeping in shape, and keeping his women satisfied. He likes to put on a show-- he knows he has a very large cock and likes to show it off. We don't blame him. He tells us that all the girls say that they really experience tremendous orgasms when they're with him. It's probably from a combination of his size plus his ability to be very sensual.

Not every guy that we meet with ends up making it to the web site, but once we showed this video to one of our staff members and she said it made her wet, we knew this one would have to make it to the site.Enjoy Chris in three scenes... in the living room, taking a bath, and finishing up in the kitchen. Pure solo ecstasy.
title: Chris
